reviews.review: 每一次进入房间的满头雾水，每一次知晓答案的茅塞顿开，每一次离开关卡的心满意足，让它拥有了无尽的魅力。
밸브가 3까지 셀 수 있으면 정말 좋겠다

本来就性价比超高，打折赔本赚吆喝了，v社游戏永远滴神。
本游戏主打解谜，搞笑，双人游戏更可以享受与好友一起绞尽脑汁的快乐。

This game is a good sequel to a good game. If you like Portal 1 you will like Portal 2. Everything Portal 1 does great Portal 2 does great aswell. The Game expands upon the foundation laid by Portal 1, by making the puzzles more complex (by adding extra mechanics), by adding a new funny sidekick, and introducing co-op mode. These extra additions make the game seem like a new game but still a Portal game

우선 전작의 별거 없는 스토리를 강화시켰고 그외 협동 플레이(즉 코옵) 추가와 (대신 같이 하는 사람이 빡대가리라면 협동플레이는 거의 못하게 될거임) 새로운 플레이 방식 추가(전작에선 무작정 포탈건만 이용해 스테이지를 깼다하면 여기선 젤, 유도 터널, 공중 신뢰 플레이트 등으로 더 많은 추가 요소들이 생겨 이것들로 스테이지를 클리어 할 수 있음) 와 3이 나오지 않아도 되는 완벽한 엔딩(3의 저주) 글고 여전히 OST는 좋더라..

Portal 2 is a great game! The single player was an amazing follow up to the first one and the co-op is challenging but rewarding! Definitely recommend playing Portal 2

Oh. My god. If it was even possible to improve on the first Portal, this game goes above and beyond. There's so much more story and lore to pore over and figure out as you play. The entire atmosphere - from the overgrown, broken down test chambers to the cold, desolate emptiness of the original facility - is absolutely incredible. I was crying by the time the game ended. Well before that, actually. [spoiler](It was the turrets' song. Had me bawling like a baby.)[/spoiler] I love how there is no really direct tutorial, either. There's subtle nudges towards what you're supposed to do instead of some big box telling you. Like the first, Portal 2 is also a must-play for anyone with a computer. This will forever be marked down as one of the best games I have ever played.
This is it. The perfect game.

9999999999/10

Recomendo que jogue o primeiro jogo (Portal) para entender melhor a historia.
Portal 2 acerta do início ao fim. O título não decepciona em nenhum momento, entregando uma experiência singular e inesquecível.
A história está cheia de reviravoltas e o elenco de personagens é extremamente carismático — até mesmo aqueles com tendências psicóticas. Não é difícil se desligar totalmente da ação somente para ficar ouvindo os comentários sarcásticos de GLaDOS e Wheatley.
Os quebra-cabeças estão muito mais desafiadores do que no original e fazem pleno uso dos novos elementos da jogabilidade. Mesmo assim, a curva de aprendizagem é tranquila e jogador nunca chega a se frustrar com os enigmas.
So, You have never played portal before. I only have one thing to say to you. WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU WAITING FOR GO BUY THE FIRST ONE BEAT IT THEN COME BUY THE SECOND ONE simple as that
one of the best games ever made. buy it. now. BUY IT.
